content.rendered:
The world has changed so much in 2020 with a global pandemic, and with that we have been staying home more with the exception of going for walks or working out outdoors, and grocery shopping. This year and moving on to 2021 it’s all about comfort…. but who said we can’t mix comfort and style?

Want to wear legging and sneakers all day long but still want to look pulled together? Throw on a well structured blazer over black leggings and don’t forget to finish off the look with your favorite designer bag and cool yet comfortable sneakers or boots.

Looking pulled together also does not require spending hours on hair and makeup. Pull your hair in a slick low bun with hair parted in the middle and add your favorite D’Lashes lashes. Also, save even more time with our new D’Lashes eyeliner pen that also doubles as lash glue. Shop D’Lashes lashes here. 

Both looks are from FWRD.COM. Bag, shoes, and earrings are all from Balenciaga. Lashes are by yours truly D’Lashes.com. 

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!
